projects.title: AirTicket – Airline Booking Backend (Microservices)
projects.desc: A scalable airline booking backend built using microservices architecture with Node.js, Express, MySQL (Sequelize ORM), AWS, RabbitMQ, and Cron Jobs. Includes Booking, Flight, Search, Auth, and Reminder services, enabling modular and maintainable code.

projects.title: Zentrox – Autonomous Workflow Automation Tool
projects.desc: A real-time, no-code workflow automation platform for startups and SMEs. Enables users to automate business tasks with an intuitive drag-and-drop workflow builder, real-time webhook triggers, and third-party integrations like Google Drive, Slack, and Notion.

projects.title: Zapier-Lite – Transactional Outbox Automation Platform
projects.desc: A simplified automation platform inspired by Zapier, focusing on atomic workflows using a transactional outbox pattern. Supports webhooks, email actions, and Solana-based bounty payouts, powered by Kafka for reliable event-driven architecture.

projects.title: CryptoTradeX – High-Performance Cryptocurrency Exchange
projects.desc: A scalable cryptocurrency exchange system focusing on concurrency, real-time trading, and high performance. Features include in-memory orderbooks, sequential workflow processing, and WebSocket streaming for live market data.

projects.title: Paytm Payment Gateway
projects.desc: A digital payment platform supporting secure P2P transactions, bank on-ramp/off-ramp, QR code payments, and merchant operations. Built using a monorepo architecture with Turborepo, featuring webhook-based real-time updates and Prisma ORM for database management.
